tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VisitorFeedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    cultural_experience VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    review TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE visitor_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    experience_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cultural_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_visited DATE NOT NULL,
    visitor_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE VisitorFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    experience_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CulturalExperiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    duration_hours INT
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    overall_rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE VisitorFeedback (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  experience_id INT,
  rating INT,
  feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CulturalExperience (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Visitor (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE RatingCategory (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
);
